      <title>Green notification for tropical cyclone NOKAEN-26. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0  (0 in Tropical Storm).</title>
      <description>From 14/01/2026 to 15/01/2026, a Tropical Depression (maximum wind speed of 74 km/h) NOKAEN-26 was active in NWPacific.
